annotation.text:
GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007
Copyright (C) 2007 Free Software Foundation, Inc. <https://fsf.org/> Everyone is permitted to copy and distribute verbatim copies of this license document, but changing it is not allowed.
Preamble
The GNU General Public License is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works.
[[pol#distribution if="Distribution of modified versions" then="allow" because="Copyleft ensures user freedoms are preserved"]]
To protect your rights, we need to prevent others from denying you these rights or asking you to surrender the rights. Therefore, you have certain responsibilities if you distribute copies of the software, or if you modify it: responsibilities to respect the freedom of others.

note.value: if="Distribution of modified versions" then="allow" because="Copyleft ensures user freedoms are preserved"
note.because: Copyleft ensures user freedoms are preserved
note.title: Copyleft ensures user freedoms are preserved
note.label: Distribution of modified versions

note.value: if="Static linking with proprietary software" then="deny" because="GPLv3 requires derivative works to be GPL-compatible"
note.because: GPLv3 requires derivative works to be GPL-compatible
note.title: GPLv3 requires derivative works to be GPL-compatible
note.label: Static linking with proprietary software

note.value: if="Use in locked-down hardware" then="deny" because="Tivoization clause forbids denial of user modification freedom"
note.because: Tivoization clause forbids denial of user modification freedom
note.title: Tivoization clause forbids denial of user modification freedom
note.label: Use in locked-down hardware

note.value: if="Patent retaliation" then="allow" because="GPLv3 includes explicit patent-retaliation protection"
note.title: GPLv3 includes explicit patent-retaliation protection
note.label: Patent retaliation

note.value: if="Network use (SaaS)" then="conditional" because="AGPL required for network copyleft; GPLv3 itself is silent"
note.because: AGPL required for network copyleft; GPLv3 itself is silent
note.title: AGPL required for network copyleft; GPLv3 itself is silent
note.label: Network use (SaaS)

note.value: if="Warranty disclaimer" then="allow" because="GPLv3 permits distribution without warranty provided the disclaimer is kept intact"
note.because: GPLv3 permits distribution without warranty provided the disclaimer is kept intact
note.title: GPLv3 permits distribution without warranty provided the disclaimer is kept intact
note.label: Warranty disclaimer

note.value: if="License text inclusion" then="allow" because="GPLv3 requires full license text to be included with distribution"
note.because: GPLv3 requires full license text to be included with distribution
note.title: GPLv3 requires full license text to be included with distribution
note.label: License text inclusion

note.value: if="Providing source code" then="allow" because="GPLv3 mandates corresponding source for distributed binaries"
note.because: GPLv3 mandates corresponding source for distributed binaries
note.title: GPLv3 mandates corresponding source for distributed binaries
note.label: Providing source code
